amendment.description: To require the Minority Business Development Agency of the Department of Commerce to promote and administer programs in the public and private sectors to assist the development of minority business enterprises and to ensure that such Agency has the necessary supporting resources, particularly during economic downturns.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2478 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
